import { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Segment, Image, Icon, Divider, Header } from 'semantic-ui-react' import Signup from '../components/auth/Signup' import Login from '../components/auth/Login' import img from '../media/hellbentLogo.png' const LoginPage = () => { const [signupVisible, setSignupVisible] = useState(false) return (
Login
{(signupVisible && ) || } New User{' '} setSignupVisible(!signupVisible)} className="ui basic teal" > Click here
) } export default LoginPage
